page.title: 03A typical family
page.content: My name is Kay,my surname is Adams.I live with my family at Hampton Bank.We live on a Dairy farm.There are five people in my family my mother,father,Mark and Ruth.I am ten,Mark is sixteen and Ruth is fourteen.Mark goes to work,Ruth goes to Ellesmere Secondary school and I go to Welshampton Primary school.We all have meals together.Sometimes in the summer I don't see my brother a lot. We all get on well.My father works on the farm with my grandfather.My mother is a housewife and helps with the farm.On Saturday I sometimes go with my father on a bike ride.On Sundays we go to chapel,that is Sunday School,and as a family we sometimes go to church. We also run a caravan site,which is for Caravan Club members,in a field near our house.
